mapper.sql: PR.f_id,PR.f_number,PR.f_address,PR.f_tel,PR.f_repair_content,date_format(PR.f_expect_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_expect_date,PR.f_expect_time_begin,PR.f_expect_time_end,PR.f_repaire_state,date_format(PR.f_cancel_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_cancel_time,date_format(PR.f_asign_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_asign_time,PR.f_asign_desc,date_format(PR.f_finished_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_finished_time,PR.f_pic_url,PR.t_group_building_f_id,PR.t_user_f_id,PR.t_room_f_id,PR.f_is_transed,PR.t_property_repairer_f_id,date_format(PR.f_estimate_door_time_begin,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_estimate_door_time_begin,date_format(PR.f_estimate_door_time_end,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_estimate_door_time_end,PR.t_property_repair_type_f_id,PR.f_software_bill_id,date_format(PR.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_sys0_add_time,date_format(PR.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_sys0_upd_time,PR.f_sys0_add_user,PR.f_finish_desc

PR.f_id as PRid,PR.f_number as PRnumber,PR.f_address as PRaddress,PR.f_tel as PRtel,PR.f_repair_content as PRrepairContent,date_format(PR.f_expect_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PRexpectDate,PR.f_expect_time_begin as PRexpectTimeBegin,PR.f_expect_time_end as PRexpectTimeEnd,PR.f_repaire_state as PRrepaireState,date_format(PR.f_cancel_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PRcancelTime,date_format(PR.f_asign_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PRasignTime,PR.f_asign_desc as PRasignDesc,date_format(PR.f_finished_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PRfinishedTime,PR.f_pic_url as PRpicUrl,PR.t_group_building_f_id as PRtGroupBuildingFId,PR.t_user_f_id as PRtUserFId,PR.t_room_f_id as PRtRoomFId,PR.f_is_transed as PRisTransed,PR.t_property_repairer_f_id as PRtPropertyRepairerFId,date_format(PR.f_estimate_door_time_begin,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PRestimateDoorTimeBegin,date_format(PR.f_estimate_door_time_end,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PRestimateDoorTimeEnd,PR.t_property_repair_type_f_id as PRtPropertyRepairTypeFId,PR.f_software_bill_id as PRsoftwareBillId,date_format(PR.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PRsys0AddTime,date_format(PR.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PRsys0UpdTime,PR.f_sys0_add_user as PRsys0AddUser,PR.f_finish_desc as PRfinishDesc

PR1.f_id as PR1id,PR1.f_number as PR1number,PR1.f_address as PR1address,PR1.f_tel as PR1tel,PR1.f_repair_content as PR1repairContent,date_format(PR1.f_expect_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PR1expectDate,PR1.f_expect_time_begin as PR1expectTimeBegin,PR1.f_expect_time_end as PR1expectTimeEnd,PR1.f_repaire_state as PR1repaireState,date_format(PR1.f_cancel_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PR1cancelTime,date_format(PR1.f_asign_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PR1asignTime,PR1.f_asign_desc as PR1asignDesc,date_format(PR1.f_finished_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PR1finishedTime,PR1.f_pic_url as PR1picUrl,PR1.t_group_building_f_id as PR1tGroupBuildingFId,PR1.t_user_f_id as PR1tUserFId,PR1.t_room_f_id as PR1tRoomFId,PR1.f_is_transed as PR1isTransed,PR1.t_property_repairer_f_id as PR1tPropertyRepairerFId,date_format(PR1.f_estimate_door_time_begin,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PR1estimateDoorTimeBegin,date_format(PR1.f_estimate_door_time_end,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PR1estimateDoorTimeEnd,PR1.t_property_repair_type_f_id as PR1tPropertyRepairTypeFId,PR1.f_software_bill_id as PR1softwareBillId,date_format(PR1.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PR1sys0AddTime,date_format(PR1.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PR1sys0UpdTime,PR1.f_sys0_add_user as PR1sys0AddUser,PR1.f_finish_desc as PR1finishDesc

if.test: _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == null or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == '' or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == false or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM != true

mapper.sql: UPDATE t_property_repair ,f_number=#{number} ,f_address=#{address} ,f_tel=#{tel} ,f_repair_content=#{repairContent} ,f_expect_date=str_to_date(#{expectDate},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_expect_time_begin=#{expectTimeBegin} ,f_expect_time_end=#{expectTimeEnd} ,f_repaire_state=#{repaireState} ,f_cancel_time=str_to_date(#{cancelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_asign_time=str_to_date(#{asignTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_asign_desc=#{asignDesc} ,f_finished_time=str_to_date(#{finishedTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_pic_url=#{picUrl} ,t_group_building_f_id=#{tGroupBuildingFId} ,t_user_f_id=#{tUserFId} ,t_room_f_id=#{tRoomFId} ,f_is_transed=#{isTransed} ,t_property_repairer_f_id=#{tPropertyRepairerFId} ,f_estimate_door_time_begin=str_to_date(#{estimateDoorTimeBegin},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_estimate_door_time_end=str_to_date(#{estimateDoorTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,t_property_repair_type_f_id=#{tPropertyRepairTypeFId} ,f_software_bill_id=#{softwareBillId} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{sys0DelUser} ,f_finish_desc=#{finishDesc} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{id}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_property_repair ,f_number=#{item.number} ,f_address=#{item.address} ,f_tel=#{item.tel} ,f_repair_content=#{item.repairContent} ,f_expect_date=str_to_date(#{item.expectDate},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_expect_time_begin=#{item.expectTimeBegin} ,f_expect_time_end=#{item.expectTimeEnd} ,f_repaire_state=#{item.repaireState} ,f_cancel_time=str_to_date(#{item.cancelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_asign_time=str_to_date(#{item.asignTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_asign_desc=#{item.asignDesc} ,f_finished_time=str_to_date(#{item.finishedTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_pic_url=#{item.picUrl} ,t_group_building_f_id=#{item.tGroupBuildingFId} ,t_user_f_id=#{item.tUserFId} ,t_room_f_id=#{item.tRoomFId} ,f_is_transed=#{item.isTransed} ,t_property_repairer_f_id=#{item.tPropertyRepairerFId} ,f_estimate_door_time_begin=str_to_date(#{item.estimateDoorTimeBegin},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_estimate_door_time_end=str_to_date(#{item.estimateDoorTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,t_property_repair_type_f_id=#{item.tPropertyRepairTypeFId} ,f_software_bill_id=#{item.softwareBillId} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{item.sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{item.sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{item.sys0DelUser} ,f_finish_desc=#{item.finishDesc} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{item.id}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_property_repair WHERE 1=1 AND f_id IN
#{item}
